thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Ben Abbot & Lindy Cook
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Ben Abbot & Lindy Cook

author: Ben Abbot & Lindy Cook
title: Ben Abbot & Lindy Cook
text: Right from the start we were enthusiastically guided through the process of reviewing properties in and around the North Melbourne area until we were successful at auction and bought a property we absolutely love. Living some way from Melbourne it can be a challenge to coordinate open inspection times and auction dates but Charlie and the team at Nelson Alexander could not have been more helpful going above an beyond on a number of occasions to accommodate us. We strongly recommend Charlie Barham at Nelson Alexander for your property search.
